Text: Panhandle Lateral Cc In visiting with the Canadian Team they have informed me that we still have not ran a pig on the TW Panhandle Lateral It has been years since this pig has been run and we are sitting with a lot of high PH liquid in the line that is acidic The last time a pig was run from Canadian River STation into P they received approxamitly bbls and the station was flooded Due to the increase in pipeline safety and awareness it is imperative that we set something up to run a pig on this line We should run a pig quarterly or at least twice a year to maintain our pipeline integrity Please let me know what you can get done on setting this up Thanks Mickey

TW Lines Cc I had sent you an email in regards to pigging on the TW Panhandle Lateral and the TW Leedey Lateral I havent heard anything and wanted to make sure you are still the person that we need to visit with on getting these task resolved If not please let me know who we need to talk to The problem is we havent ran a pig on these lines in years In order to insure our pipeline integrity we need to work through these obstacles and get something resolved We know we have lots of liquid in these lines and need to proceed with pigging Please let me know what we need to do to get this accomplished Thanks Mickey
